abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts more than doubled its fourth-quarter profit as the landscape for leveraged buyouts continued to improve.
snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts more than doubled its fourth-quarter profit as the landscape for leveraged buyouts continued to improve.

headline.main: K.K.R. Posts Fourth-Quarter Earnings of $697 Million

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
